ya4.2.1:6.1: ⇒ Yassa cakkhudhātu uppajjati tassa sotadhātu uppajjatīti?
ya4.2.1:7.1: Sacakkhukānaṃ asotakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ sotadhātu uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:7.2: Sacakkhukānaṃ sasotakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati sotadhātu ca uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:8.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana sotadhātu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhātu uppajjatīti?
ya4.2.1:9.1: Sasotakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotadhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:9.2: Sasotakānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotadhātu ca uppajjati cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:10.1: ⇒ Yassa cakkhudhātu uppajjati tassa ghānadhātu uppajjatīti?
ya4.2.1:11.1: Sacakkhukānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ ghānadhātu uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:11.2: Sacakkhukānaṃ saghānakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati ghānadhātu ca uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:12.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana ghānadhātu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhātu uppajjatīti?
ya4.2.1:13.1: Saghānakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānadhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:13.2: Saghānakānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānadhātu ca uppajjati cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:14.1: ⇒ Yassa cakkhudhātu uppajjati tassa rūpadhātu uppajjatīti?
ya4.2.1:15.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana rūpadhātu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhātu uppajjatīti?
ya4.2.1:16.1: Sarūpakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpadhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:16.2: Sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpadhātu ca uppajjati cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:17.1: ⇒ Yassa cakkhudhātu uppajjati tassa manoviññāṇadhātu uppajjatīti?
ya4.2.1:18.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana manoviññāṇadhātu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhātu uppajjatīti?
ya4.2.1:19.1: Sacittakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:19.2: Sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu ca uppajjati cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:20.1: ⇒ Yassa cakkhudhātu uppajjati tassa dhammadhātu uppajjatīti?
ya4.2.1:21.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana dhammadhātu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhātu uppajjatīti?
ya4.2.1:22.1: Acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammadhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:22.2: Sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammadhātu ca uppajjati cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati.
ya4.2.1:23.1: (Yathā āyatanayamakaṃ vibhattaṃ evaṃ dhātuyamakampi vibhajitabbaṃ, sadisaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
